title: New Portfolio
description: I recently launched my new portfolio, inspired by React components but built with JavaScript and Tailwind CSS. I've structured parts of the content, like my projects and tech stack, using JSON files for better flexibility and scalability.

title: Football Club Website (React)
description: As part of a group project during my internship, I am helping develop a modern and responsive website for a football club using React. The site features structured navigation, a dynamic hero section, and integrations with APIs to display the club's latest Instagram posts and match results. The project focuses on usability, performance, and clean design to create an engaging experience for visitors.

title: Interactive German Learning for Children
description: For my thesis project, I am developing an interactive web application designed to help children learn German in a fun and engaging way. The platform incorporates clickable elements and exercises to practice vocabulary and spelling. Built with .NET, the application includes essential MVC features such as user authentication, an admin panel, and unlockable content upon purchase.

title: Design & UX
description: In this project i created a simple page for a fictitious law firm, the goal here was a nice design and get a deeper understanding of WordPress.

title: Lära ABC
description: This website gives young children a helping hand to learn, among other things, the alphabet, numbers and animals in German.

title: Internship one
description: During my first internship, I was tasked with creating a site for a customer who delivers gravel, the site was created in WordPress, but is not live.

title: Walking With Style
description: The second group work during my education was to create an e-commerce platform in .NET. Some CRUD is implemented.

title: Calculater with JS, HTML & CSS
description: A simple calculator that I made to deepen my knowledge of JavaScript and also design a calculator.

title: Ekenberg's Graphical Waters
description: Side project for my creative side that I combine with delving into JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

title: Side project with HTML, CSS och JavaScript
description: Practice makes perfect, more immersion in JavaScript, try changing colors on the page, calculate BMI or degrees.

title: Calculator with C#
description: During the first programming course I was given the assignment to create a calculator, I added some extra functions to mine, feel free to check it out.

title: Task 1 JavaScript
description: I improved user interaction by adding JavaScript to HTML and CSS, logging email inputs, updating the phone field, enhancing search, and generating dynamic car product cards with images and links. Challenges included handling dynamic class names and refining a countdown timer.

title: Task 2 JavaScript
description: I integrated the NiceSelect library for a sleek design of the select element. I created an interactive card game with dynamic functions that change images on click, using custom illustrations. Event listeners handle clicks, and NiceSelect enhances search functionality. I experimented with setInterval for a time limit and may use alternative identifiers if needed.

title: Old portfolio
description: When I started my education at TUC to become a webdeveloper I made this simple portfolio with just HTML and CSS.

title: Group project - The Bathhouse
description: Part of the first group project was also a fictional bathhouse that was part of Grönviksdal municipality.

title: Group project - Youth Recreation Center
description: Part of the first group project was the youth recreation center in Grönviksdal municipality.

title: Group project - Grönviksdal Municipality
description: My first experience with agile methods and scrum was the group work Grönvikdal Municipality

title: Webshop
description: At the beginning of my education, I made a simple webshop with only HTML and CSS

title: Internets utveckling
description: The first task during my TUC training I had to make a website about the development of the internet, agile methods and my inspiration

title: Webcomic
description: As a creative person, I wanted to combine HTML and CSS with writing and illustrating a Webcomic

title: IoT
description: An IoT project where I created a security system that notifies when the front door is opened
